description: ln - command line hardlinks. This tool is kind of a NTFS Swiss Army Knife and can do lots of things, like create SmartCopies, which preserve the inner and outer Hardlink/Junction/SymbolicLink structure, does hardlink based incremental Backups and a lot of other things which can not be found anywhere.
notes: Check https://schinagl.priv.at/nt/ln/ln.html#introduction for usage. Substitute ln with lnp
